description: This app is the ideal on-the-go study aid for the busy networking professional!   ||  Designed for Palm webOS, Upward Mobility's flash cards will give you the vocabulary you need to succeed at the CompTIA Network+ certification exam.   *  Hone your knowledge with 270 Network+ terms and concepts taken straight from the CompTIA Network+ exam, each followed by a clear and concise explanation and definition.   *  Our flash card app has simple, intuitive navigation, with the ability to shuffle cards, to remove flash cards from the deck, and to reset the deck. Vocabulary Topics include Network Terminology, Network Topologies, Communication Methods, Data Delivery, Media and Hardware, Network Implementation, TCP/IP, LAN and WAN Infrastructure, Troubleshooting, and Network Security.  ||  CompTIA Network+ is incorporated in certification tracks for Microsoft, Novell, Cisco, and HP.  Forward your career today!  ||  preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  We hire only expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and put all of our materials through a thorough review process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
